00023     int setInhabitant(int x, int y, Organism *org);
00024     char getSymbol(int x, int y);

00026 
00027   private:
00028     int width; // How many columns wide the field is.
00029     int height; // How many rows tall the field is.
00030 
00031     /* We store the field as 2-D array of pointers to Organisms.
00032      * It is actually implemented as a 1-D array of pointers.
00033      * Each entry is a pointer to an array of pointers to Organisms
00034      * (each of these arrays represents one column)..
00035      * Each entry of THOSE arrays is a pointer to an Organism.
00036      * (NULL means uninhabited).
00037      * This way we can access the array as array[row][column].
00038      */
00039 
00040     Organism*** array;        
00041   };
